pull.title: log: Increase signal-to-noise in bitcoind standard output. Don't print debug output "Pre-allocating to position ..." and "Leaving block file ..." when running with -nodebug (default).

events.message: log: Increase signal-to-noise in non-debug logging. Don't print debug output "Pre-allocating to position" and "Leaving block file" when running with -nodebug.

events.body: concept ACK, allocation prints have never helped me debug anything ever to be honest.

utACK 904681cf3adc5ada0e28232f8133bf6781f8ec6a Nice PR! I verified these prints don't occur in any other places (you got them all).
@MarcoFalke Would you mind taking a look at this small log readability improvement? Three utACK/ACK/Concept ACKs so far :-)
